data.text:
The number of established languages listed in Ethnologue is 7. These are:

Makhuwa

Malagasy

Swahili

It is reported that there is no specialized education for deaf children on Comoros. It is also reported that 60% of handicapped children, in which category deaf children fall, fail to attend any education.

There is no information about any form of sign language being used formally in education. Since many deaf children do not attend school, it is likely that many children use home sign
